Class AdjustableLED

java.lang.Object
  AdjustableLED

public class AdjustableLED
extends Object

This class represents a PWM LED connected to the Raspberry pi on a given pin (default pin 6) Connect the physical LED to a GND pin and to a GPIO pin.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Fabio Hedayioglu, Ian Utting

Constructor Summary

          Creates the Adjustable LED in a given pin number.
